overview:
Shannon M. Wilkinson is the founder and CEO of Reputation Communications, a reputation management firm based in New York City.

Ms. Wilkinson blogs about reputation and image management at Reputation Issues and is on Twitter @shannonnewyork. She is the author of “Online Reputation Management: What Every Influencer Needs to Know,” a guide for CEOs and high-profile newsmakers, and creator of “Protecting Your Reputation in a Digital World,” a quick-glance Tumblr overview for everyone wishing to learn more about online reputation management.

She has initiated media coverage for clients on “Bloomberg.com”, “Huffington Post” and “The Chronicle of Philanthropy” as well as in “Forbes”, “The New York Times”, “Wall Street Journal” and many other media outlets. She developed her career during the 1980s and ’90s while serving as CEO of Cultural Communications, a PR agency serving corporate and cultural clients in New York City. Cultural Communications merged with Reputation Communications in September 2011.

Ms. Wilkinson is a member of the Reputation Institute, the Public Relations Society of America and the Financial Communications Society.
